title: Massachusetts man fatally shoots neighbor and then himself, prosecutors say
description: A Massachusetts man allegedly broke into his neighbor's home Monday, killing her, and injuring her grandkids before fatally shooting himself with a gun.

title: Maui firefighters lost house but kept fighting on wildfire front line
description: Firefighters Aina Kohler and Jonny Varona are among the many residents affected by the Maui wildfire.

title: Army, Marines and Navy without chiefs as Republican holds up nominations
description: The Unites States is without confirmed chiefs for three of its military services.

title: Mark Meadows seeks to move Fulton County election case to federal court
description: Former White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows officially filed Tuesday to move the election interference case brought against him in Fulton County into federal court.

title: DeSantis takes a different tone on Disney fight: 'Moved on'
description: Ron DeSantis has "basically moved on" from his conflict with Disney he told CNBC on Monday -- a shift in tone for the governor, who is running for president

title: How the Georgia pardon process works in light of Trump's latest indictment
description: With former President Donald Trump indicted on criminal charges for the fourth time, the pardoning process in Georgia has come into focus.

title: Prosecutors deny they 'reneged' on Hunter Biden plea deal
description: Prosecutors for new special counsel David Weiss are pushing back on Hunter Biden's assertion that they "reneged" on his ill-fated plea deal, according to a court filing.

title: Hawaiian Electric shares plummet 40% after Maui wildfires lawsuit
description: The cause of the Maui wildfires remains under investigation.

title: Ex-FBI counterintelligence chief pleads guilty in case related to Russian billionaire
description: McGonigal, who retired from the FBI in 2018, had been charged with violating U.S. sanctions.

title: 'Perfect irony': Giuliani faces RICO charge like the one he popularized as prosecutor
description: Decades ago, as a U.S. attorney, Rudy Giuliani revolutionized the use of RICO laws to fight crime -- but now he finds himself on the other side of his legal legacy.

title: AP African American studies canceled by Arkansas officials just before school begins
description: College Board's AP African American studies has been canceled by the Arkansas Department of Education just before the school year started.

title: Mar-a-Lago property manager pleads not guilty to new charges in documents probe
description: Carlos De Oliveira, the property manager at Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago estate, has pleaded not guilty to new charges in the special counsel's classified documents case.

title: Russia targets western Ukraine with missiles overnight, hits civilian infrastructure
description: Russian forces have unleashed a barrage of missiles on regions across Ukraine, killing civilians and damaging infrastructure

title: Trial to begin for white Mississippi men charged with shooting at Black FedEx driver
description: A trial is set to begin for two white men in Mississippi who are accused of chasing and shooting at a Black FedEx driver who had dropped off a package at a home

title: Homeowners were having issues with hot water tank before deadly blast, officials say
description: Authorities say the owners of a home that exploded in western Pennsylvania were having issues with their hot water tank but the cause of the blast remains under investigation

title: What's in the Georgia Trump indictment
description: Former President Donald Trump and 18 other co-defendants have been hit with racketeering charges related to overthrowing the 2020 election.

title: Biden heads to battleground Wisconsin to talk about economy week before GOP debate
description: President Joe Biden is stopping in the battleground state of Wisconsin to discuss how economic policies he calls “Bidenomics” are boosting the economy

title: Northeastern China threatened by flooding as rivers rise above warning levels
description: A vast swath of northeastern China is threatened by flooding as at least 90 rivers have risen above warning levels and 24 have already overflowed their banks

title: Texas sues Shell over May fire at Houston-area petrochemical plant
description: Texas is suing Shell, alleging a fire at the oil giant's Houston-area petrochemical plant damaged the environment

title: Retail sales rise 0.7% in July from June as inflation continues to ease
description: Americans increased their spending last month as inflation continued to ease on eggs, electronics, used cars and other items, and the job market remains healthy

title: Ex-priest has prison sentence extended to 40 years for molesting 72nd child victim
description: An Australian ex-priest convicted of sexually abusing children has had another 12 months added to his 39-year prison sentence for molesting a 72nd victim

title: Spain beats Sweden 2-1 and advances to its first Women's World Cup final
description: Spain will play for its first Women’s World Cup championship after Olga Carmona’s goal in the 89th minute lifted La Roja to a 2-1 victory over Sweden in the Tuesday semifinal

title: WATCH:  Drone footage shows destruction from Maui wildfires
description: Drone footage shows the vast destruction in the town of Lahaina after deadly wildfires ravaged parts of the Hawaiian island of Maui.

title: Sweeping indictment could be Trump's biggest legal challenge yet: ANALYSIS
description: Numerous charges haven't yet slowed the former president's 2024 campaign.

title: Dozens killed in gas station explosion in Russia, local officials say
description: An explosion at a gas station in Russia late Monday killed dozens and injured many more, local officials said.

title: Massive explosion at gas station in Russia's Dagestan kills 27, injures more than 100
description: Russian officials say a massive explosion at a gas station in Russia’s southern republic of Dagestan has killed 30 people and injured scores of others

title: Former 'Family Feud' contestant Timothy Bliefnick gets life for wife's murder
description: A judge has sentenced a former contestant on the television game show “Family Feud” to life in prison after he was convicted of first-degree murder in the slaying of his estranged wife in western Illinois

title: Police raid on small Kansas newspaper sets off constitutional alarms
description: A police raid on a small-town Kansas newspaper is prompting a First Amendment fight.

title: Nestle recalls some Toll House chocolate chip cookie dough
description: Nestlé USA said it initiated a recall of some of its chocolate chip cookie dough products due to the "potential presence of wood fragments."
